data.title: Movies directed by Warren Beatty
data.meta_description: On Reelviews you can find extended reviews and ratings for movies directed by Warren Beatty, including thoughts on the world of cinematography by James Berardinelli.
data.text:
Bulworth

I'd like to say that Bulworth is the best political satire in years, but the truth is that is has tough competition from Barry Levinson's corrosive Wag the Dog in that department. Both films succeed admirably, but, although each takes aim at the s...

Rules Don't Apply

Rules Don’t Apply is a strange, schizophrenic sort of movie. Despite moments of emotional strength and bursts of quirky comedy, the film is undone by its generally lethargic tone and the film’s insistence to shift its focus from the putat...
